verses.verse: <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3040>Jedidah<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> of <S%H1218>Boscath<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and turned not <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass in the <S%H8083%H6240>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H683>Azaliah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that he may <S%H8552>sum<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> which is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>door<s%> have <S%H622>gathered<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>:

And let them <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6213>doers<s%> of the <S%H4399>work<s%>, that have the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and let them <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H6213>doers<s%> of the <S%H4399>work<s%> which is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>,

Unto <S%H2796>carpenters<s%>, and <S%H1129>builders<s%>, and <S%H1443>masons<s%>, and to <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H4274>hewn<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Howbeit there was no reckoning <S%H2803>made<s%> with them of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, because they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H530>faithfully<s%>.

¶ And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, I have <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and he <S%H7121>read<s%> it.

And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5413>gathered<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>, that have the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H5046>shewed<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> me a <S%H5612>book<s%>. And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
And it came to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4320>Michaiah<s%>, and <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and <S%H6222>Asahiah<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3212>Go<s%> ye, <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for me, and for the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and for all <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, concerning the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%>: for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that is <S%H3341>kindled<s%> against us, because our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H5612>book<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> according unto all that which is <S%H3789>written<s%> concerning us.

So <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H296>Ahikam<s%>, and <S%H5907>Achbor<s%>, and <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and <S%H6222>Asahiah<s%>, <S%H3212>went<s%> unto <S%H2468>Huldah<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess<s%>, the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8616>Tikvah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2745>Harhas<s%>, <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H899>wardrobe<s%>; (now she <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H4932>college<s%>;) and they <S%H1696>communed<s%> with her.
¶ And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>Tell<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to me,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, even all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> which the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> hath <S%H7121>read<s%>:

Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, that they might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with all the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>; therefore my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall be <S%H3341>kindled<s%> against this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>.

But to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> which <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thus shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> to him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, As touching the <S%H1697>words<s%> which thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%>;

Because thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H7401>tender<s%>, and thou hast <S%H3665>humbled<s%> thyself <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> what I <S%H1696>spake<s%> against this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, that they should become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, and hast <S%H7167>rent<s%> thy <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me; I also have <S%H8085>heard<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Behold therefore, I will <S%H622>gather<s%> thee unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H622>gathered<s%> into thy <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>; and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon this <S%H4725>place<s%>. And they <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.
